settings.worldName: String: Visible name of the world
settings.worldDescription: String: Visible description of the world
settings.playerTexture: String: The appearance of the player. Must be in ENTITIES LIBRARY

generationAxes.primary: String: Defines what the primary axe represents when generating biomes (e.g., 'TEMPERATURE', 'WEALTH', 'CORRUPTION'). Can be anything
generationAxes.secondary: String: Defines what the secondary axe represents when generating biomes (e.g., 'HUMIDITY', 'CRIME RATE', 'TECHNOLOGY'). Can be anything

biomes.biomeName: String: Visible name of this biome
biomes.biomeDescription: String: Visible description of this biome
biomes.biomeType: String: Generation type of this biome. Must be one of: 'REGION' (base layer), 'ABOVE' (rarer, sits on top of 'REGION')

generationAxes.primary: Number (0.0 to 1.0): The ideal value on the Primary Axis for this biome. Make sure biomes cover everything, from 0.0 to 1.0.
generationAxes.secondary: Number (0.0 to 1.0): The ideal value on the Secondary Axis for this biome. Make sure biomes cover everything, from 0.0 to 1.0.

biomes.rarity: Number: 0.5 (very common) to 0.99 (extremely rare). Only for 'ABOVE' biome type

visuals.groundColor: String: Hex color (#rrggbb) for the floor/terrain in this biome
visuals.groundNoiseIntensity: Number: Defines how noisy the ground looks in this biome. Must be from 0.01 (smooth/flat) to 0.2 (very noisy/rocky)

props.texture: String: The appearance of the prop. Must be in OBJECTS LIBRARY
props.density: Number: Density of this prop in each chunk. Must be between 0.001 (0.1% - rare) and 1.0 (100% - extremely dense)

entities.texture: String: The appearance of the entity. Must be in ENTITIES LIBRARY
entities.displayName: String (Optional): The visible name of the entity. Set to NULL if entity is generic.
entities.density: Number: Density of this prop in each chunk. Must be between 0.001 (0.1% - rare) and 1.0 (100% - extremely dense)
traits: String: The behavior of the entity. Choose all traits that apply. Must be one of: 'AGGRESSIVE' (attacks player when in range), 'REGENERATIVE' (slowly regenerates its health over time & runs away if health is too low), 'COWARD' (runs away when health gets low), 'WANDERER' (wanders around), 'CURIOUS' (follows the player when in range), 'STALKER' (when in range, follows the player from a distance)

stats.health: String: The health of this entity. Must be one of: 'VERY LOW', 'LOW', 'MEDIUM', 'HIGH', 'VERY HIGH'
stats.movementSpeed: String: The speed at which this entity moves. Must be one of: 'VERY LOW', 'LOW', 'MEDIUM', 'HIGH', 'VERY HIGH'
stats.visionRange: String: The vision range of this entity. Must be one of: 'VERY LOW', 'LOW', 'MEDIUM', 'HIGH', 'VERY HIGH'
